title: "TomTom creates AI-based conversational assistant for vehicles with Microsoft"
text: "Digital mapping specialist TomTom said on Tuesday it has partnered with tech giant Microsoft to create an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered conversational assistant for vehicles."

title: "TomTom joins forces with Microsoft to bring Generative AI into the vehicle"
tickers: it is bringing the benefits of generative artificial intelligence (AI) to the global automotive industry."

title: "Activision Blizzard will pay $54 million to settle California workplace discrimination suit"
text: "California's Civil Rights Department reached a settlement with Activision Blizzard late last week two years after the state regulator brought a lawsuit alleging gender discrimination
source_name: pay inequities and a culture of sexual harassment at the video game company."
